title: Enhancing Hospitality Practical Competencies: Machine Learning-Based Water Meter Failure Prediction Project

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can explain noise reduction and meaningful sample extraction methodologies through the analysis of water meter data characteristics.
Learners can achieve over 80% accuracy in fault prediction models by applying human-computer collaborative learning.
Learners can collaborate with domain experts to enhance data semantics and construct datasets with statistical representativeness.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
